description:
Add Multi-Platform Playlist Export/Import with Intelligent Song Matching and Download Integration

Implement comprehensive batch export and import functionality that enables users to transfer playlists between multiple streaming services (Spotify, YouTube Music, and others) using standardized playlist formats, with intelligent cross-platform song matching and automated download capabilities through Lidarr and MeTube.

Requirements:

Export Functionality:
- Support exporting playlists from Spotify and YouTube Music
- Generate playlists in multiple standard formats: M3U, XSPF, and JSON
- Include comprehensive metadata (song title, artist, album, duration, ISRC codes if available)
- Support batch export of multiple playlists simultaneously
- Provide progress indicators for long-running export operations

Import Functionality:
- Parse and validate M3U, XSPF, and JSON playlist files
- Import playlists to target streaming services (Spotify, YouTube Music)
- Handle batch import of multiple playlists in a single operation
- Preserve playlist metadata (name, description, order)
- Report import success/failure statistics per playlist

Intelligent Song Matching Service:
- Implement fuzzy matching algorithm for songs across platforms
- Match songs using multiple criteria: ISRC codes (primary), title + artist, title + artist + album
- Handle edge cases: remasters, live versions, featured artists, spelling variations
- Provide confidence scores for matches (exact, high confidence, low confidence, no match)
- Allow user review and manual selection for low-confidence matches
- Generate detailed matching reports showing successful matches and failures

Download Integration:
- Integrate with Lidarr API for automated music downloads
  - Send matched songs/albums to Lidarr for acquisition
  - Monitor Lidarr download status and report completion
  - Handle Lidarr search results and quality profile selection
  - Map streaming service metadata to Lidarr's expected format (MusicBrainz IDs when available)
  
- Integrate with MeTube API for YouTube downloads
  - Send YouTube Music URLs to MeTube for downloading
  - Track MeTube download queue and status
  - Provide download completion notifications
  - Include workflow notes indicating manual file organization required
  - Generate organized file lists showing downloaded files needing manual relocation
  - Optionally suggest target directory structure based on playlist organization

- Download workflow options:
  - Allow users to choose download method per song (Lidarr vs MeTube)
  - Batch send entire playlists to download services
  - Configure default download preferences (prefer Lidarr for albums, MeTube for singles, etc.)
  - Skip songs already available locally if library scanning is implemented

Platform Integration:
- Authenticate with Spotify API and YouTube Music API
- Connect to Lidarr API (configure host, port, API key)
- Connect to MeTube API (configure host, port)
- Handle API rate limiting and quota management for all services
- Implement retry logic for transient failures
- Support OAuth flows for secure user authorization (Spotify, YouTube Music)
- Validate Lidarr and MeTube connectivity on configuration

User Experience:
- Display clear progress during export/import/download operations
- Show detailed results summary (total songs, successful matches, failed matches, downloads queued)
- Allow users to review and resolve ambiguous matches before finalizing import
- Provide option to save unmatched songs for manual resolution
- Export matching report for user records
- Display download status dashboard showing Lidarr and MeTube queue status
- Provide manual intervention reminders for MeTube downloads
- Allow users to mark MeTube downloads as "organized" after manual file movement

Error Handling:
- Validate playlist file formats before processing
- Handle network failures gracefully with retry options for all API connections
- Manage API authentication expiration for streaming services
- Handle Lidarr/MeTube connection failures with clear diagnostic messages
- Provide clear error messages for unsupported formats or API issues
- Handle scenarios where songs cannot be found in Lidarr's indexers
- Manage MeTube download failures (unavailable videos, geo-restrictions)
- Log errors for debugging without exposing sensitive data (API keys, tokens)

Configuration:
- Settings panel for Lidarr connection (URL, API key, default quality profile, root folder)
- Settings panel for MeTube connection (URL, default download path)
- User preference for default download service
- Toggle options for automatic download vs manual approval
